title: Auslan Interpreted Event for the OPL Finals - Perth, Western Australia.
body:
{{summoner:2}} 
Hi Everyone, this is the Auslan Deaf Summoners Club - Perth, looking at setting up an Auslan Interpreted Event for the OPL Finals @ Game City in the Perth Underground. Near Raine Square. More Details to come... But I require your input.

What would you like to see at this event?
Do you have a laptop to bring?
If you are under 18, Do you want Parental Units to be there, or maybe just some really cool nerdy Auslan adults who will look after you...
If you are over 18, Do you want to help? :P
Can you afford $5?
Would you rather the profits if any, go towards the lovely guys at Game City or the WA Deaf Society?

and lastly, what kind of Loot would you like me to get from RIOT?

**Keep in touch with us @
Page: https://www.facebook.com/AuslanDeafSummonersClub/
Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/537333886433998/
League Chat: Deaf Summoners Club**

Thanks very much,



Alvin
_- Auslan Deaf Summoners Club._

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
